title: Available NOW!! Luxury Studio w/in-unit W/D in secured bldg Emeryville
posting_body: Luxury Studio with in-unit W/D in secured building Emeryville
One of the most spacious floor plans.
Convenience of well-maintained condo living with the feel of independent housing having sweeping views of pretty Courtyard.
Due to the volume of inquiries, no phone calls please.
Please send email by Click “Request a tour” or “Check Availability” or “Email” with your credit score and desire move in date, we will contact you to schedule an appointment.
- Third level unit located at Bridgewater, one of the most stylish, upbeat and energetic condominium community in Emeryville
- Stainless steel appliances: Dishwasher, microwave, oven/ range and refrigerator
- Triple pane windows (very quiet inside the unit; no sound of the freeways/Emeryville trains)
- 1 designated parking space included in the rent with plenty of free guest parking
- Verified monthly gross household income 2.5X rent.
- Tenant pays electricity, internet and cable
- Deposit and 1st month rent (and any partial month rent) due at lease signing
- Tenant required to carry renter's insurance policy ($500K liability)
- Tenant agrees to abide by all Homeowner's Association Rules & Regulations
- Preference will be given to early move-in qualified tenants
Offered and managed by The Cal Agents Realty, DRE# 02020017
- Easy access to Freeways 880, 80, 580 and the Bay Bridge
- Across the street Causal Carpool and transbay bus for easy commute to the City and free Emery Go Round stop to Bart
- 5 min walk to the hip Emery Bay Public Market with lots of food choices
- Minutes from Bay Street Shopping Center, movie theater, grocery stores, restaurants, cafes and banks
- Gated and secured access to covered parking garage
- Package service (Security desk accepts packages, to be picked up later at a convenient time)
- Business center/Conference room (24/7 access and free WiFi)
- Fully furnished Clubhouse (can be reserved for private use once every 6 months at no charge)
- Free Charge Point stations for Electric car
The HOA is doing exterior remodeling throughout the Bridgewater complex.

All 424 condos will have new windows, sliding patio doors, new roof, new siding, new paint, decks, balconies... will cost about $11million dollars, during the next two years, including repairs/upgrades to the swimming pool and clubhouse.
Throughout the exterior of complex, you will see workmen, scaffolding, construction...
For our particular building #2, that work/scaffolding is estimated to be Jan 2023 to June 2023, approximately.
During construction, there will be noise, dust, and inconveniences.
When they get to replacing our particular condominium's window and patio door, workman must come inside intermittently for a week or two.
Nothing inside the condominium will change, aside from the new window and patio door.
The kitchen, bathroom, living room... will remain the same.
